item.description:
Thursday, July 17 (MUST RSVP TO JOIN THIS EVENT!)
Where: Seattle's Best cafe inside Borders Bookstore, Downtown Crossing/State Street stop

Who should come?

Advanced speakers who have already mastered the basics and are looking to improve or maintain their speaking skills.

The Prerequisite Check

If you are a NON-NATIVE Japanese speaker who can converse in Japanese for 5 minutes without switching to English or another language.

If you are a NATIVE Japanese speaker who can converse in English for 5 minutes without switching to Japanese.

Please understand that this is a level-specific event and DO take the Prerequisite Check seriously. I cannot stress enough how important it is that the attendees all obtain a similar level of fluency. If you find yourself (and I will find you too) struggling to follow the conversation half the time during the event please consider taking a class or getting a language partner before joining us again. I hope everyone will follow this rule voluntarily. If not, you will find yourself unRSVPed.

The Game

6:30- 6:40
Jiko Shoukai

6:40- 7:25
ADVANCED ENGLISH
Please use English only

7:25- 8:10
ADVANCED JAPANESE
Please use Japanese only

8:10 - 8:30
FLEXIBLE TIME
Free Conversation.

The Rules

Check your level before RSVPing
Try your best to be on time, or at least show up before 7:00
No English during Japanese-Only practice
No Japanese during English-Only practice
No inappropriate comments/jokes
No showing up without RSVPing
item.name: Thursday Coffee- for Advanced Speakers
